https://github.com/pre-commit/pygrep-hoo.name: check blanket noqa
https://github.com/pre-commit/pygrep-hoo.description: Enforce that `noqa` annotations always occur with specific codes

https://github.com/pre-commit/pygrep-hoo.name: check for not-real mock methods
https://github.com/pre-commit/pygrep-hoo.description: Prevent common mistakes of `assert mck.not_called()`, `assert mck.called_once_with(...)` and `mck.assert_called`.
https://github.com/pre-commit/pygrep-hoo.entry:
(?x)(
    assert .*\.(
        not_called|
        called_
    )|
    # ''.join(rf'(?<!\b{s})' for s in dir(mock) if s.endswith('Mock')))
    (?<!\bAsyncMock)(?<!\bMagicMock)(?<!\bMock)(?<!\bNonCallableMagicMock)(?<!\bNonCallableMock)(?<!\bPropertyMock)
    \.assert_(
        any_call|
        called|
        called_once|
        called_once_with|
        called_with|
        has_calls|
        not_called
    )($|[^(\w])
)

https://github.com/fluttercommunity/impo.name: Dart Import Sorter
https://github.com/fluttercommunity/impo.description:
Dart package to automatically organize your dart imports. Any dart project supported!    
Will sort imports alphabetically and then group them in the following order:
1. Dart imports
2. Flutter imports
3. Package imports
4. Project imports
